channel.title: How do i change the name of an item?
channel.description: people say its in class8.java but 1. i wanted to change it server sided, and 2. the item i want to change is not in class8.java

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

Search in class8.java

under that add this

if(i == ITEMS ID) { class8.aString170 = "NAME OF ITEM"; class8.aByteArray178 = "DESCRIPTION.".getBytes(); }

I don’t believe you can change the name of the item server sided, except by using Item.java but that only edits the trade screen and equip screen

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the name of an item?

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

[quote=“202685, post:6, topic:440634”]you change it in class8.java

so just look up an item… just search “Dragon”

then underneath that, add this code

if(i == ITEM ###) { class8.aString170 = "Dragon full helm"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A full face helmet.".getBytes(); }

just put in the right item ## in the INTEM # slot and compile… as for the source, go into item.cfg and search ur item, change it then compile and DONE[/quote]
no shit! im not stupid, ive already searched the item name and the ## its not in there…

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the name of an item?

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.description:
@202685 wrote:

you change it in class8.java

so just look up an item… just search “Dragon”

then underneath that, add this code

if(i == ITEM ###) { class8.aString170 = "Dragon full helm"; class8.aByteArray178 = "A full face helmet.".getBytes(); }

just put in the right item ## in the INTEM # slot and compile… as for the source, go into item.cfg and search ur item, change it then compile and DONE

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the name of an item?

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Shadow742000:

317 delta

What Item are you trying to change?
Even if it isn’t in the class8.java you can still change the name of it.
And server sided it would be in item.cfg, but that only changes the name of it in shops.
If you want the name changed completely it’s class8.java.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the name of an item?

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.source: How do i change the name of an item?

item.title: How do i change the name of an item?
item.dc:creator: @Skiire Skiire
item.description:
@Skiire wrote:

If it’s not in class8, I’m assuming you’re using PI? If so check out itemDef. I had to do that a while back.

		if (i == 6786) {
			itemDef.name = "Jennie's Robe Top";
			itemDef.description = "Quite appealing.".getBytes();
			itemDef.actions = new String[5];
		}

Just an example of how you would use it. I’m not sure you can, or why you would want to, change the name server-sided.

Read full topic
